page.title: 14Farms-Swanley area
page.content: We found that 6 farms in our area grew barley,mushrooms,raspberries and other assorted fruit and vegetables. Four farms had sizes of 6,120,200 and 400 acres.Most managers lived at the farm and did about 10 hours work a day. They employed 1,3,4 and up to 50 workers.To farms had orchards,1 of plums,and 2 of conference pears.3 farms also had barns. 1 farm was a chicken farm with 44,000 birds the machines the farms had included 5 tractors,a plough,seed drills,rotovators,cultivator,sprayers, irrigation machines,planters and 1 even had a combine harvester. The farmers had all worked at 2 or 3 farms previously.They had worked at their present farm for 8,10,27 and 28 years.
